column1: Information exposure through a stack trace
column2: Information from a stack trace propagates to an external user. Stack traces can unintentionally reveal implementation details that are useful to an attacker for developing a subsequent exploit.
column4: [["Error information"|"relative:///service/src/main/java/uk/gov/mca/beacons/api/accountholder/rest/AccountHolderController.java:109:56:109:69"]] can be exposed to an external user.
